subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: After my horrible crash at the Giro and coming back for the Tour de Suisse — where I was still racing with broken bones — I consider what I’ve done here so far a success.
snippet: After my horrible crash at the Giro and coming back for the Tour de Suisse — where I was still racing with broken bones — I consider what I’ve done here so far a success.
